synthesis_conditions.equipment: long pyrex tube with inner diameter of 5 mm
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Elemental Analysis was performed on the sample after removing the crystals and washing with TCE.

equipment: Bruker SMART Apex CCD area detector diffractometer
graphite monochromated and MonoCap-collimated Mo Kα radiation (λ = 0.71073 Å)
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Data were processed with the SAINT+ program for data reduction and cell refinement. Multiscan absorption corrections were applied using the SADABS program.

equipment: beamline 11-BM at the Advanced Photon Source (APS), Argonne National Laboratory
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Data points collected every 0.001º 2θ and scan speed of 0.01º/s. Corrections applied for detector sensitivity, 2θ offset, small differences in wavelength between detectors, and the source intensity.

α was calculated by first plotting the cell parameter data versus temperature. The best polynomial fit was found, the first derivative was taken, which was then divided by the cell parameter value at that given temperature to find α.
